short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chromium extension to display interesting trivia about Roger Federer at the Australian Open

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With the 2021 edition of the Australian Open coming up, and with Roger Federer not being a part of it, I created this extension for tennis fans, Roger Federer fans and sports fans in general, so they can continue to celebrate Roger Federer's brilliance at the Australian Open. Every time the user opens a new tab, it will display some interesting trivia about the tennis legend.
